scripts.all: clear && composer lint && composer check && composer s:5 && composer test
scripts.check: vendor/bin/phpcs --standard=php-coding-standard.xml --extensions=php -sp config public resources src tests
scripts.check:summary: vendor/bin/phpcs --standard=php-coding-standard.xml --extensions=php -sp --report=source config public resources src tests
doc: clear && phpDocumentor.phar -d . --ignore vendor/ -t var/tmp/phpdoc --cache-folder var/tmp/phpdoc/.cache && browser-sync start --server 'var/tmp/phpdoc'
scripts.lint: vendor/bin/parallel-lint config public resources src tests
scripts.s:5: vendor/bin/phpstan analyse public src tests --level=5 --ansi -c phpstan.neon
scripts.s:6: vendor/bin/phpstan analyse public src tests --level=6 --ansi -c phpstan.neon
scripts.s:7: vendor/bin/phpstan analyse public src tests --level=7 --ansi -c phpstan.neon
scripts.s:8: vendor/bin/phpstan analyse public src tests --level=8 --ansi -c phpstan.neon
scripts.s:strict: clear && vendor/bin/phpstan analyse public src --level=8 --ansi -c phpstan-strict.neon
